text: let's just repeat the news we broke just
a minute or two ago reports from Munich
in southern Germany say shots have been
fired in a shopping center German media
say police are evacuating the Olympic
shopping mall in the northwest of the
city details are still coming in we can
see some pictures there they appear to
show some people certainly making their
way out of the shopping center but we've
got no firm details of what exactly is
happening there we will obviously bring
them to you as we get it
